languages.text: {n}Заливистый юношеский смех звучит совсем неуместно в этом темном месте.{/n} "Лаэнарта, любимая, свою последнюю статую я посвящаю тебе! Не плачь, мой Путь Скульптора подошел к концу, но впереди меня ждет иная дорога. Ты пройдешь ее вместе со мной?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Заливистый юношеский смех звучит совсем неуместно в этом темном месте.{/n} "Лаэнарта, любимая, свою последнюю статую я посвящаю тебе! Не плачь, мой Путь Скульптора подошел к концу, но впереди меня ждет иная дорога. Ты пройдешь ее вместе со мной?"

languages.text: {n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"
languages.original_text: {n}Заливистый юношеский смех звучит совсем неуместно в этом темном месте.{/n} "Лаэнарта, любимая, свою последнюю статую я посвящаю тебе! Не плачь, мой Путь Скульптора подошел к концу, но впереди меня ждет иная дорога. Ты пройдешь ее вместе со мной?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Rollicking young laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark room.{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

{n}Rollicking young laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark room.{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

{n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

{n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

{n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

languages.text: {n}La entusiasta y jovial risotada suena totalmente fuera de lugar en este taller de lo macabro.{/n} «¡Laenartha, mi amor, te dedico mi última estatua! No llores. Puede que haya llegado al final de mi senda como escultor, pero ahora se abre ante mí una nueva senda. ¿Querrás recorrerla a mi lado?».
languages.original_text: {n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La entusiasta y jovial risotada suena totalmente fuera de lugar en este taller de lo macabro.{/n} «¡Laenartha, mi amor, te dedico mi última estatua! No llores. Puede que haya llegado al final de mi senda como escultor, pero ahora se abre ante mí una nueva senda. ¿Querrás recorrerla a mi lado?».

languages.text: {n}若々しく元気な笑い声は、この暗い場所にはまったく似つかわしくない。 {/n} 「愛するラエナルタよ、私の最後の像を君に捧げよう！泣かないでくれ。私の彫刻家としての道は終わったかもしれないが、私には別の道が待っている。君も一緒に歩いてくれないか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}若々しく元気な笑い声は、この暗い場所にはまったく似つかわしくない。 {/n} 「愛するラエナルタよ、私の最後の像を君に捧げよう！泣かないでくれ。私の彫刻家としての道は終わったかもしれないが、私には別の道が待っている。君も一緒に歩いてくれないか？」

languages.text: {n}热情洋溢的欢快笑声响了起来，与这个黑暗的地方格格不入。{/n}“莱纳莎，我的爱人，我把我最后的雕像献给你！别哭了，或许我的雕刻家道途已经走到了尽头，但我还可以选择另一条道途。你愿意和我一起吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}热情洋溢的欢快笑声响了起来，与这个黑暗的地方格格不入。{/n}“莱纳莎，我的爱人，我把我最后的雕像献给你！别哭了，或许我的雕刻家道途已经走到了尽头，但我还可以选择另一条道途。你愿意和我一起吗？”

languages.text: {n}Le rire exubérant n'a pas sa place dans un endroit si sinistre :{/n} « Laenartha, mon amour, je te dédie ma dernière statue ! Ne pleure pas. Ma Voie de sculpteur touche peut-être à sa fin, mais un chemin différent s'offre à moi. Accepteras-tu de le suivre avec moi ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire exubérant n'a pas sa place dans un endroit si sinistre :{/n} « Laenartha, mon amour, je te dédie ma dernière statue ! Ne pleure pas. Ma Voie de sculpteur touche peut-être à sa fin, mais un chemin différent s'offre à moi. Accepteras-tu de le suivre avec moi ? »

languages.text: {n}Der dunkle Ort wird erfüllt von überschwänglichem Gelächter, was völlig fehl am Platz wirkt.{/n} "Laenartha, mein Herz, ich widme Euch meine letzte Statue! Weint nicht. Mein Pfad des Bildhauers mag zu Ende sein, aber vor mir liegt ein neuer Weg. Werdet Ihr mich begleiten?"
languages.original_text: {n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der dunkle Ort wird erfüllt von überschwänglichem Gelächter, was völlig fehl am Platz wirkt.{/n} "Laenartha, mein Herz, ich widme Euch meine letzte Statue! Weint nicht. Mein Pfad des Bildhauers mag zu Ende sein, aber vor mir liegt ein neuer Weg. Werdet Ihr mich begleiten?"

languages.text: {n}Bu karanlık mekânda kulağa son derece yersiz gelen, genç birine ait coşku dolu bir kahkaha duyuluyor.{/n} "Laenartha, kalbimin sahibi, son heykelimi sana ithaf ediyorum. Heykeltıraş'ın Yolu'ndaki yürüyüşüm sona erse de önümde beni bekleyen farklı yollar var. O yollarda bana eşlik eder misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}The ebullient youthful laughter sounds entirely out of place in this dark place:{/n} "Laenartha, my love, I dedicate my last statue to you! Don't cry. My Path of the Sculptor may be at its end, but I have a different path ahead of me. Will you walk it with me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu karanlık mekânda kulağa son derece yersiz gelen, genç birine ait coşku dolu bir kahkaha duyuluyor.{/n} "Laenartha, kalbimin sahibi, son heykelimi sana ithaf ediyorum. Heykeltıraş'ın Yolu'ndaki yürüyüşüm sona erse de önümde beni bekleyen farklı yollar var. O yollarda bana eşlik eder misin?"
